messages.title: Lib Dems are delivering for you and your family

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have delivered an £800 income tax cut.
The biggest state pension rise delivered by the Coalition Government.
The Lib Dems in government have enabled better childcare policy.
Lib Dems commit to £8 billion extra for the NHS.
More than three times more apprenticeships in the area since 2010.

issues.economy: The economy is back on track due to the efforts of the Lib Dems in government.
issues.health: NHS has been a major focus, with commitments from a holistic nurse about the services.

endorsements.endorsement: Describes the £800 income tax cut as amazing.
Claims the biggest pension rise ever.
Speaks as a holistic nurse on the human face of the NHS.
Comments on the economy being back on track under the Lib Dems.

images.caption: Lib Dems are delivering for you and your family.
THE LIB DEMS HAVE CHANGED POLITICS FOR THE BETTER. A RECORD OF DELIVERY AND A PROMISE OF MORE.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Lib Dems claim credit for tax cuts, better childcare policy, and improved support for the NHS and jobs. They also highlight that they stopped the Conservatives from implementing more extreme measures.
